name: lunchmoney
description: Manage your Lunch Money finances with AI assistance
long_description: Connect Claude to your Lunch Money account to analyze spending patterns, manage budgets, track transactions, and get insights about your finances. This extension provides full access to Lunch Money's API, enabling you to manage categories, transactions, budgets, assets, and more through natural language commands.

tools.name: get_user
tools.description: Get details on the current user

tools.name: get_all_categories
tools.description: Get a flattened list of all categories in alphabetical order associated with the user's account.

tools.name: get_single_category
tools.description: Get hydrated details on a single category. Note that if this category is part of a category group, its properties (is_income, exclude_from_budget, exclude_from_totals) will inherit from the category group.

tools.name: create_category
tools.description: Create a single category.

tools.name: create_category_group
tools.description: Create a single category group.

tools.name: update_category
tools.description: Update the properties for a single category or category group.

tools.name: add_to_category_group
tools.description: Add categories (either existing or new) to a single category group.

tools.name: delete_category
tools.description: Delete a single category or category group. This will only work if there are no dependencies, such as existing budgets for the category, categorized transactions, categorized recurring items, etc. If there are dependents, this endpoint will return what the dependents are and how many there are.

tools.name: force_delete_category
tools.description: Delete a single category or category group and along with it, disassociate the category from any transactions, recurring items, budgets, etc. Note: it is best practice to first try the Delete Category endpoint to ensure you don't accidentally delete any data. Disassociation/deletion of the data arising from this endpoint is irreversible!

tools.name: get_all_tags
tools.description: Get a list of all tags associated with the user's account.

tools.name: get_transactions
tools.description: Retrieve transactions within a date range with optional filters

tools.name: get_single_transaction
tools.description: Get details of a specific transaction

tools.name: create_transactions
tools.description: Insert one or more transactions

tools.name: update_transaction
tools.description: Update an existing transaction

tools.name: unsplit_transactions
tools.description: Remove one or more transactions from a split

tools.name: get_transaction_group
tools.description: Get details of a transaction group

tools.name: create_transaction_group
tools.description: Create a transaction group

tools.name: delete_transaction_group
tools.description: Delete a transaction group or a single transaction.

tools.name: get_recurring_items
tools.description: Retrieve a list of recurring items to expect for a specified month

tools.name: get_budget_summary
tools.description: Get budget summary for a specific date range. The budgeted and spending amounts will be broken down by month.

tools.name: upsert_budget
tools.description: Create or update a budget for a specific category and month

tools.name: remove_budget
tools.description: Remove a budget for a specific category and month

tools.name: get_all_assets
tools.description: Get a list of all manually-managed assets associated with the user

tools.name: create_asset
tools.description: Create a new manually-managed asset

tools.name: update_asset
tools.description: Update an existing manually-managed asset

tools.name: get_all_plaid_accounts
tools.description: Get a list of all Plaid accounts associated with the user

tools.name: trigger_plaid_fetch
tools.description: Trigger a fetch of latest data from Plaid (Experimental). Note that fetching may take up to 5 minutes.

tools.name: get_all_crypto
tools.description: Get a list of all cryptocurrency assets associated with the user

tools.name: update_manual_crypto
tools.description: Update a manually-managed cryptocurrency asset balance

LUNCHMONEY_API_TOKEN.title: LunchMoney API Token
LUNCHMONEY_API_TOKEN.description: Your LunchMoney API token. You can obtain this from https://my.lunchmoney.app/settings/developer
